title: Royal Thai Army unveils upgraded L70 AA gun
dc:creator: Jr Ng
description:
The Royal Thai Army (RTA) has released the first images of its upgraded Bofors (now BAE Systems) 40mm L/70 Anti-Aircraft (AA) guns on its social media account on 21 October, featuring new a new optoelectronic system and integration work by local firm Armisys Supply Company. The enhanced AA guns, designated the L70 OES (Type A […]

The post Royal Thai Army unveils upgraded L70 AA gun appeared first on Asian Military Review.
